task.title: Pin Manually
task.shortdesc: Pin nodes using the "drag and drop" technique.

copyright.copyrholder: Use of this public-domain resource is governed by the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License

step.cmd: "Click and hold" to grab a graphed node.
Without releasing the mouse, drag the node to an unmarked area.
Release the mouse to "drop" the node and fix in place.

taskbody.postreq: Click and drag the node a second time to Unpin (release) the node.
